articles.description: Beyoncé leads the field with nine nominations, while a pair of rock and country categories are completely dominated by women.
articles.content:
In January 2018, gender parity at the Grammys hit a new low. 
In the 86 categories, only 17 women (or female-fronted acts) won the Grammy award. SZA, the most-nominated woman of the night, went home… [+3850 chars]

articles.author: Melissa Mitas
articles.title: 'The Queen's Gambit' Star Anya Taylor-Joy Revealed She Was Bullied as a Child: 'I Used To Get Locked in Lockers' - Showbiz Cheat Sheet
articles.description: Anya Taylor-Joy of the Netflix hit 'The Queen's Gambit' said she felt 'so isolated' during her childhood after moving from Buenos Aires to London.
articles.content: The new Netflix hit The Queen’s Gambit recently set a record with 62 million households viewing the series. Based on the novel of the same name, the storyline follows chess prodigy Beth Harmon, an or… [+3624 chars]

articles.title: Eddie Van Halen's guitars and Michael Jackson's glove are among musical mementos on auction block - Daily Mail
articles.description: The musical instruments coming from the collection of the late Van Halen - which include a 2004 EVH Charvel Art Series guitar - are projected to bring in between $60,000 and $80,000 apiece.
